document.full_text: school was canceled and residents were told to stay indoors in texas city on tuesday after power failures forced three large oil refineries and a chemical plant to shut operations and burn toxic gases.
document.title: southwest: texas: power failures cause refineries to shut
lines_and_colors: school was canceled and residents were told to stay indoors in texas city on tuesday after power failures forced three large oil refineries and a chemical plant to shut operations and burn toxic gases.
